title: so i quit smoking cigs a week ago
body: withdrawals have been hard.  little bit ago i was playing hearthstone, enemy has lethal on board and 8 hp.  i top deck pyroblast for the win, ACCIDENTALLY HIT END TURN WHEN I TRY TO EMOTE.  throw my mouse into the wall, its now broken.   have to use a tiny laptop mouse till tomorrow qq.  withdrawal makes me so on edge i hate it.
